languages.text: "Если вы думаете, что отделаетесь только отступными — вы глубоко ошибаетесь".

traits.locale_text: "Если вы думаете, что отделаетесь только отступными — вы глубоко ошибаетесь".

languages.text: "You are sorely mistaken if you think you're getting away with only compensation."
languages.original_text: "Если вы думаете, что отделаетесь только отступными — вы глубоко ошибаетесь".

traits.locale_text: "You are sorely mistaken If you think you are getting away with just a compensation."
"You are sorely mistaken If you think you are getting away with just a compensation."
"You are sorely mistaken if you think you're getting away with only compensation."
"You are sorely mistaken if you think you're getting away with only compensation."
"You are sorely mistaken if you think you're getting away with only compensation."

languages.text: “如果你以为只要进行赔偿就能逃避惩罚，那你可就大错特错了。”
languages.original_text: "You are sorely mistaken if you think you're getting away with only compensation."

traits.locale_text: “如果你以为只要进行赔偿就能逃避惩罚，那你可就大错特错了。”

languages.text: «Se equivoca de cabo a rabo si cree que con una simple compensación basta».
languages.original_text: "You are sorely mistaken if you think you're getting away with only compensation."

traits.locale_text: «Se equivoca de cabo a rabo si cree que con una simple compensación basta».

languages.text: 「賠償だけで済むと思っているのなら大間違いだ」
languages.original_text: "You are sorely mistaken if you think you're getting away with only compensation."

traits.locale_text: 「賠償だけで済むと思っているのなら大間違いだ」

languages.text: "Ihr macht einen großen Fehler, wenn Ihr glaubt, dass Ihr nur mit einer Wiedergutmachung davonkommt."
languages.original_text: "You are sorely mistaken if you think you're getting away with only compensation."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr macht einen großen Fehler, wenn Ihr glaubt, dass Ihr nur mit einer Wiedergutmachung davonkommt."

languages.text: « Si vous pensez vous en sortir avec une simple compensation, vous vous mettez le doigt dans l'œil. »
languages.original_text: "You are sorely mistaken if you think you're getting away with only compensation."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous pensez vous en sortir avec une simple compensation, vous vous mettez le doigt dans l'œil. »

languages.text: "Bu karşılık ile yakanızı kurtarabileceğinizi düşünüyorsan yanılıyorsun."
languages.original_text: "You are sorely mistaken if you think you're getting away with only compensation."

traits.locale_text: "Bu karşılık ile yakanı kurtarabileceğini düşünüyorsan çok yanılıyorsun."
